instructions:
This sheet is for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games(WEG) that uses the d6 pool system.
* Recommended for 2E, 2E R&E and REUP games, rolls from sheet uses Wild Die 
* NPC sheet available 
* Customization options to hide some sections & show/hide GM rolls available 
* More info check out the sheet's [wiki page](https://wiki.roll20.net/Star_Wars_WEG_D6_character_sheet) 

 Option for a 1E rolls are in the works as well as expanding the Vehicle section in the near future(2018-07-31). 

 Issues, Ideas & Questions can be sent to the [active editor](https://app.roll20.net/users/1223200)
